009package imagingbook.common.ransac;
010
011import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
012import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Primitive2d;
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * Represents a single detection result returned by an implementation of
017 * {@link RansacDetector}. Implements the {@link Comparable} interface for
018 * sorting by detection score. See Sec. 12.1 of [1] for additional
019 * details.
020 * </p>
021 * <p>
022 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
023 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
024 * </p>
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2022/11/19
028 *
029 * @param <T> generic primitive type
030 */
031public class RansacResult<T extends Primitive2d> implements Comparable<RansacResult<T>> {
032        
033        private final T primitiveInit;
034        private final T primitiveFinal;
035        private final double score;
036        private final Pnt2d[] draw;
037        private final Pnt2d[] inliers;
038        
039        // full constructor (initially inliers = null)
040        public RansacResult(Pnt2d[] draw, T primitiveInit, T primitiveFinal, double score, Pnt2d[] inliers) {
041                this.primitiveInit = primitiveInit;
042                this.primitiveFinal = primitiveFinal;
043                this.score = score;
044                this.draw = draw;
045                this.inliers = inliers;
046        }
047        
048        /**
049         * Returns the initial primitive (e.g., a circle) obtained from the randomly 
050         * drawn points.
051         * @return the initial primitive
052         */
053        public T getPrimitiveInit() {
054                return primitiveInit;
055        }
056        
057        /**
058         * Returns the final primitive obtained by fitting to all inlier points.
059         * @return the final primitive
060         */
061        public T getPrimitiveFinal() {
062                return primitiveFinal;
063        }
064        
065        /**
066         * Returns the score (number of inliers) associated with this result.
067         * @return the score
068         */
069        public double getScore() {
070                return score;
071        }
072
073        /**
074         * Returns the randomly drawn points that lead to this result.
075         * @return array of points
076         */
077        public Pnt2d[] getDraw() {
078                return draw;
079        }
080        
081        /**
082         * Returns the set of inliers (points) associated with this result.
083         * @return array of points
084         */
085        public Pnt2d[] getInliers() {
086                return inliers;
087        }
088        
089        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
090        
091        @Override
092        public int compareTo(RansacResult<T> other) {
093                return Double.compare(other.score, this.score);
094        }
095
096}
